column2: The petitioner filed this application seeking several reliefs in the
journal entry dated 12.03.2015, the interim relief sought by the

column1: petitioner has been refused by this Court.

column2: By paragraphs 1 and 3 of the counter written submission of the
petitioner  confines  his  relief  only  to  paragraph  (b)  of  the  prayer
